languages.text: "Я лишь выполняю свою работу, {name}". {n}Голос Хейнрикса полон саркастического яда.{/n} "Я не слышал, чтобы ты официально объявил{mf||а} себя покровител{mf|ем|ьницей} этого ксеноса — а следовательно, Ордос в своем праве!"

"I am merely doing my job, {name}." {n}Heinrix's voice drips with sarcastic venom.{/n} "I have not heard you officially declare yourself the protector of this xenos, and so the Ordo is fully within its rights to act!"
languages.original_text: "Я лишь выполняю свою работу, {name}". {n}Голос Хейнрикса полон саркастического яда.{/n} "Я не слышал, чтобы ты официально объявил{mf||а} себя покровител{mf|ем|ьницей} этого ксеноса — а следовательно, Ордос в своем праве!"

traits.locale_text: "I am merely doing my job, {name}." {n}Heinrix's voice drips with sarcastic venom.{/n} "I have not heard you officially declare yourself the protector of this xenos, and so the Ordos is fully within its rights to act!"
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I am merely doing my job, {name}." {n}Heinrix's voice drips with sarcastic venom.{/n} "I have not heard you officially declare yourself the protector of this xenos, and so the Ordos is fully within its rights to act!"
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I am merely doing my job, {name}." {n}Heinrix's voice drips with sarcastic venom.{/n} "I have not heard you officially declare yourself the protector of this xenos, and so the Ordos is fully within its rights to act!"
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I am merely doing my job, {name}." {n}Heinrix's voice drips with sarcastic venom.{/n} "I have not heard you officially declare yourself the protector of this xenos, and so the Ordo is fully within its rights to act!"
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “我只是在完成我的本职工作，{name}。”{n}海因里希不无挖苦地说。{/n}“我还没有听到你正式宣布成为这个异形的保护者，审判庭自然有权采取行动！”
languages.original_text: "I am merely doing my job, {name}." {n}Heinrix's voice drips with sarcastic venom.{/n} "I have not heard you officially declare yourself the protector of this xenos, and so the Ordo is fully within its rights to act!"

traits.locale_text: “我只是在完成我的本职工作，{name}。”{n}海因里希不无挖苦地说。{/n}“我还没有听到你正式宣布成为这个异形的保护者，审判庭自然有权采取行动！”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «Simplemente cumplo con mi obligación, {name}». {n}La voz de Heinrix está impregnada de un sarcasmo ponzoñoso.{/n} «¡No le he oído declararse oficialmente como {mf|protector|protectora} de este xenos, y por tanto los Ordos tienen pleno derecho para actuar!».
languages.original_text: "I am merely doing my job, {name}." {n}Heinrix's voice drips with sarcastic venom.{/n} "I have not heard you officially declare yourself the protector of this xenos, and so the Ordo is fully within its rights to act!"

traits.locale_text: «Simplemente cumplo con mi obligación, {name}». {n}La voz de Heinrix está impregnada de un sarcasmo ponzoñoso.{/n} «¡No le he oído declararse oficialmente como {mf|protector|protectora} de este xenos, y por tanto los Ordos tienen pleno derecho para actuar!».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « Je ne fais qu'accomplir mon devoir, {name},{n}déclare Heinrix d'un ton venimeux.{/n} Je ne vous ai pas entendu déclarer que ce xénos était officiellement placé sous votre protection. L'Ordo est donc en droit d'agir ! »
languages.original_text: "I am merely doing my job, {name}." {n}Heinrix's voice drips with sarcastic venom.{/n} "I have not heard you officially declare yourself the protector of this xenos, and so the Ordo is fully within its rights to act!"

traits.locale_text: « Je ne fais qu'accomplir mon devoir, {name},{n}déclare Heinrix d'un ton venimeux.{/n} Je ne vous ai pas entendu déclarer que ce xénos était officiellement placé sous votre protection. L'Ordo est donc en droit d'agir ! »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Ich mache nur meine Arbeit, {name}." {n}Heinrix' Stimme trieft vor Sarkasmus.{/n} "Ich habe nicht gehört, dass Ihr Euch offiziell zum Beschützer dieses Xenos erklärt habt, und so hat der Ordos völlige Legitimation zu handeln!"
languages.original_text: "I am merely doing my job, {name}." {n}Heinrix's voice drips with sarcastic venom.{/n} "I have not heard you officially declare yourself the protector of this xenos, and so the Ordo is fully within its rights to act!"

traits.locale_text: "Ich mache nur meine Arbeit, {name}." {n}Heinrix' Stimme trieft vor Sarkasmus.{/n} "Ich habe nicht gehört, dass Ihr Euch offiziell zum Beschützer dieses Xenos erklärt habt, und so hat der Ordos völlige Legitimation zu handeln!"
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「我は己の仕事を果たしているだけだ、{name}」{n}ハインリックスの声には、皮肉めいた毒が秘められていた。{/n}「我は、あなたがこの異種族の公的な後見人であるという宣言は聞いていない。故に、純血の団はその権利を果たすことはできる！」
languages.original_text: "I am merely doing my job, {name}." {n}Heinrix's voice drips with sarcastic venom.{/n} "I have not heard you officially declare yourself the protector of this xenos, and so the Ordo is fully within its rights to act!"

traits.locale_text: 「我は己の仕事を果たしているだけだ、{name}」{n}ハインリックスの声には、皮肉めいた毒が秘められていた。{/n}「我は、あなたがこの異種族の公的な後見人であるという宣言は聞いていない。故に、純血の団はその権利を果たすことはできる！」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Yalnızca işimi yapıyorum {name}." {n}Heinrix'in sesinden iğneleyici bir zehir damlıyor.{/n} "Kendini resmî olarak bu zenonun koruyucusu ilan ettiğini işitmedim. Bu nedenle Nizam, harekete geçme hakkına bütünüyle sahiptir."
languages.original_text: "I am merely doing my job, {name}." {n}Heinrix's voice drips with sarcastic venom.{/n} "I have not heard you officially declare yourself the protector of this xenos, and so the Ordo is fully within its rights to act!"

traits.locale_text: "Yalnızca işimi yapıyorum {name}." {n}Heinrix'in sesinden iğneleyici bir zehir damlıyor.{/n} "Kendini resmî olarak bu zenonun koruyucusu ilan ettiğini işitmedim. Bu nedenle Nizam, harekete geçme hakkına tamamen sahip."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
